title: IIFCL targets Rs 75000 crore loan book this fiscal
description: "We are expecting to cross a loan book of over Rs 75000 crore this fiscal. We had touched almost Rs 60,000 crore last fiscal" said PR Jaishankar, Managing Director, IIFCL at the companyâ€™s stakeholders meet in Mumbai on Friday.
